short-title.#text:
West Coast Ocean Protection Act of
			 2013

text.#text: This Act may be cited as the

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail:
is amended by
			 adding at the end the following:

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#text:
Section
			 8 of the Outer Continental Shelf Lands Act

header.#text:
Prohibition of
			 oil and gas leasing on the outer Continental Shelf off the coast of California,
			 Oregon, and Washington

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail:
shall not issue a lease for the exploration, development, or production of oil
				or natural gas in any area of the outer Continental Shelf off the coast of the
				State of California, Oregon, or
				Washington.

text.#text:
Notwithstanding any
				other provision of this section or any other law, the

header.#text:
Prohibition of
				Oil and Gas Leasing in Certain Areas of the Outer Continental
				Shelf

current-chamber.#text: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

official-title.#text:
To amend the Outer Continental Shelf Lands Act to
		  permanently prohibit the conduct of offshore drilling on the outer Continental
		  Shelf off the coast of California, Oregon, and Washington.
